appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appShortName.description: The short version of the application title.

appDesc.message: Enable Smart Card access on your Chromebook
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

mainWindowTitle.description: The title of the main window

mainWindowHeader.description: The header displayed in the main window

readersListHeader.description: The header displayed in front of the readers list

addDevice.description: Title of the button that can be used to open a dialog for adding a new Smart Card reader

readerDescriptionProductNamePart.description: Part of the device description string that displays the product name field

readerDescriptionManufacturerNamePart.description: Part of the device description string that displays the manufacturer name field

unknownReaderDescription.description: Device description string, in case no meaningful device information is available

openAbout.description: Title of the link that can be used to open the App's About page

exportLogs.description: Title of the link that can be used to copy the logs into the clipboard

exportLogsExporting.description: Title of the link that can be used to copy the logs into the clipboard, during the copying process

exportLogsExported.description: Title of the link that can be used to copy the logs into the clipboard, shortly after the copying process has finished

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogTitle.description: Window title of the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogHeader.description: Caption displayed in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogAllow.description: "Allow" button title in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogDeny.description: "Block" button title in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogMessag.description: The prefix of the message displayed in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog, when the App is in the bundled list of the known Apps
The App name part of the message displayed in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog, when the App is in the bundled list of the known Apps

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogMessag.message: is trying to access the Smart Card Connector. Would like to grant this App permission to access Smart card readers?
pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogMessag.description: The suffix of the message displayed in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog, when the App is in the bundled list of the known Apps

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogMessag.message: [DEBUG ONLY] The app from unknown vendor
pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogMessag.description: The prefix of the message displayed in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog, when the App is not in the bundled list of the known Apps. This message will never be used in the production version

The App id part of the message displayed in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog, when the App is not in the bundled list of the known Apps. This message will never be used in the production version

pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogMessag.message: is trying to access the Smart Card Connector. Would like to grant this App permission to access Smart card readers?
pcscClientHandlingUserPromptDialogMessag.description: The suffix of the message displayed in the PC/SC-Lite client handling user prompt dialog, when the App is not in the bundled list of the known Apps. This message will never be used in the production version

aboutWindowTitle.description: The title of the About window

aboutWindowHeader.description: The header displayed in the About window

appLinkTextPrefix.message: This App can be found on the Chrome Web Store
appLinkTextPrefix.description: The beginning of the sources block, that will be followed with the link tag pointing to the App page

appLinkTitle.description: Title displayed on the link pointing to the App page

sourcesLinkTextPrefix.message: The sources of the App are available
sourcesLinkTextPrefix.description: The beginning of the sources block, that will be followed with the link tag pointing to the App sources page

sourcesLinkTitle.description: Title displayed on the link pointing to the App sources page

privacyPolicyTextPrefix.message: By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at
privacyPolicyTextPrefix.description: The beginning of the privacy policy block, that will be followed with the link tag pointing to the Google privacy policy page

thirdPartyLicensesHeader.message: Notice of Open Source Code and Licenses
thirdPartyLicensesHeader.description: The header displayed in front of the third-party library licenses list

thirdPartyLicensesIntroduction.message: Additionally, this App utilizes open source libraries from third parties that come with their own licenses. Please see below for each library and associated license:
thirdPartyLicensesIntroduction.description: The text displayed in front of the third-party library licenses
